      • setMaxFPS

        public void setMaxFPS(int max)
        Changes the max FPS the game is allowed to render at. When 0, there is no limit.
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum number of frames that should be rendered in a second.

      • setRenderFPS

        public void setRenderFPS(boolean render)
        Changes the state of whether or not to render the FPS.
        Parameters:
        render - If true, the FPS will be rendered in text at the top-left of the screen.
